question: Hyaena, hogdeer, nilgai, goral, sponges and barking deer are listed in which of the following Schedules of the Wildlife Protection Act?
explanation: Hyaena, hogdeer, nilgai, goral, sponges and barking deer are listed in  Schedules 3 of the Wildlife Protection Act.  The penalties in schedule 3 are lower compared to schedule 1 and part 2 of schedule 2.
